body_html:
@meteorcloudy it was with --binary when I got the above error. After your response I tried couple of times with and without --binary and finally omit the patch error. My build is now crashing with another error - can you help me further? Note also the warning in the middle.

$ ./bazel build --config=opt --cpu=x64_windows --host_cpu=x64_windows --copt=-w --host_copt=-w //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
____Loading complete.  Analyzing...
____Loading package: tensorflow/core/profiler

____Loading package: @highwayhash//
____Loading package: @farmhash_archive//
____Loading package: @com_googlesource_code_re2//
____Loading package: @sqlite_archive//
____Loading package: @gif_archive//
____Loading package: @jsoncpp_git//
____Loading package: @png_archive//
____Loading package: @jpeg//
WARNING: D:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:1652:1: in includes attribute of cc_library rule //tensorflow/core:framework_headers_lib: '../../external/nsync/public' resolves to 'external/nsync/public' not below the relative path of its package 'tensorflow/core'. This will be an error in the future. Since this rule was created by the macro 'cc_header_only_library', the error might have been caused by the macro implementation in D:/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl:913:30.

____Loading package: @pcre//

____[15 / 260] Expanding template external/jpeg/jconfigint_nowin.h
____[40 / 457] Writing file external/snappy/libsnappy.a-2.params [for host]
____[42 / 463] Writing file external/jpeg/libsimd_none.a-2.params [for host]
ERROR: D:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:1562:1: Executing genrule //tensorflow/core:version_info_gen failed (Exit 127).
/usr/bin/env: 'python': No such file or directory

body:
@meteorcloudy it was with `--binary` when I got the above error. After your response I tried couple of times with and without `--binary` and finally omit the patch error. My build is now crashing with another error - can you help me further? Note also the warning in the middle.
```
$ ./bazel build --config=opt --cpu=x64_windows --host_cpu=x64_windows --copt=-w --host_copt=-w //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

This will be an error in the future.
